```{r}
# run clustering
devtools::load_all("../")
cciaUse("~/Desktop/DOHERTY/cecelia", initConda = FALSE)

# init ccia object
cciaObj <- initCciaObject(
  pID = pID, uID = "CIMecC", versionID = versionID, initReactivity = FALSE # Set
)

# run task
funParams <- list(
  isSequence = TRUE
)

task <- cciaObj$runTask(
  funName = "importImages.upload",
  funParams = funParams,
  envVars = HPC_CONF,
  hpcDir = paste(hpcDir, pID, "ANALYSIS", sep = "/"),
  # env = "hpc",
  env = "local",
  # runInplace = FALSE,
  runInplace = TRUE,
  taskID = 1
)
```
